name: com.alexhoedlmoser.advanced-gui
description: This package includes advanced and animated GUI elements for Unity

samples.description: (IMPORTANT: this sample is dependent on the Prefabs sample folder, so make sure to import it as well) Contains a sample scene showcasing how multiple AdvancedGUI components can be used to setup a main menu and a settings menu, including smooth transitions between menu pages.
Contains prefabs that already hav AdvancedGUI components fully setup, which include a normal button, a carousel button, a toggle and a slider.
Contains a library of style themes that can be applied to a AdvancedGUIManager component to change the look of all AdvancedGUI components in a scene.
